result.longName: Shanghai MicroPort EP MedTech Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shanghai MicroPort EP Medtech Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, marketing, and sale of minimally invasive medical devices. The company offers Columbus 3D EP navigation systems and cardiac electrophysiology stimulators; FireMagic 3D irrigated and cardiac RF ablation catheters; EasyLoop circular mapping catheters; OptimAblate irrigation pumps and cardiac RF generators; and PathBuilder steerable introducers, transseptal needles, and transseptal guiding introducers. It also provides EasyFinder electrophysiology diagnostic catheters; and FlashPoint renal artery RF generators and renal artery RF ablation catheters, as well as cables. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Wei Chuang Electrophysiology Medical Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai MicroPort EP Medtech Co., Ltd. in April 2016. Shanghai MicroPort EP Medtech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
